techmeme.title: Sources: a16z seeks to raise a $20B megafund for growth-stage investments in AI companies; global LPs see it as a way to invest in US firms without restrictions (Reuters)
Transcarent, which offers a medical concierge app service for businesses, completes its ~$621M acquisition of digital health company Accolade, taking it private (Ashley Capoot/CNBC)
Qualtrics founder and Utah Jazz owner Ryan Smith launches a $1B fund aimed at connecting tech startups with sports and entertainment across 20 to 25 investments (Alex Konrad/Upstarts Media)
Blackbird Labs, which makes a blockchain-based payment loyalty app for ~1,000 restaurants, raised $50M led by Spark Capital, taking its total funding to $85M (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Amazon launches Nova Sonic, which can generate natural-sounding speech and that it claims is "the most cost-efficient" AI voice model on the market, via Bedrock (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
